TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KioskSlideMode extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlLeafElement

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is p:kiosk.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **kiosk (Kiosk Slide Show Mode)** This element specifies that the presentation slide show should be viewed in a full-screen kiosk mode. A presentation viewed in kiosk mode should have user input disabled and restarts after a specified interval. [*Example*: Consider the following presentation that is set to be viewed in a looping kiosk mode. ```xml … … ``` *end example*] |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |showPr (§19.2.1.30)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |restart (Restart Show)|Specifies the time length that the presentation should run until it is to be restarted. That is, the presentation should loop back to the first slide specified in the presentation or custom show. This value is specified in 1/1000ths of a second and measured from the most recent time the presentation started or restarted.

[*Note*: The counter is reset when a presentation is restarted due to automatic looping at the end of a show, if specified by the loop attribute of showPr. *end note*]

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *unsignedInt* datatype.| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_ShowInfoKiosk) is located in §A.3. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
